node.title: Boy, 7, who drowned in neighbour's pool remembered as 'lovely, affectionate and caring' child
node.description: A boy, 7, who drowned in his neighbour's pool north of Adelaide has been remembered by his grieving family as a "lovely" child.
node.content:
["The grieving family of a \"lovely, humble and caring\" seven-year-old boy who drowned in a backyard swimming pool in Adelaide's north say he loved swimming.", "Ajok Garang drowned in a swimming pool at a neighbour's house on Goodfield Road, Para Hills West, about 6:30pm last night.", "His family said Ajok was playing with his siblings in their backyard when he climbed the back fence and ended up in the neighbour's pool.", "Ajok was one of six children and his mother was inside preparing dinner when she heard the \"heartbreaking\" news.", "Paramedics were called but the boy was unconscious and died at the scene.", "Ajok's father, Deng Garang, said he had no words about\u00a0losing\u00a0his son, who would diligently wait for him to arrive home from work.", "\"When I come home from work in the morning I've got him waiting at the door at six o'clock.\u00a0He is the one opening the door for me,\" Mr Garang said as tears streamed down his face.", "", "
Ajok Garang with his father, Deng.(Supplied)
", "\"Maybe God will reward me back for my loss, we used to be connected, he was my friend.", "\"We share one bed, we eat from the same dish.\"", "Mr Garang said the house was securely fenced and he was not sure how his son died.", "Cousin Biar Garang said Ajok's death was a huge loss to his family and the wider South Sudanese community.", "\"He was a very lovely, humble and caring kid.", "\"Ajok will be missed.\"", "The seven-year-old was a student at Madison Park School.", "\"He loved school.\u00a0He loved swimming lessons every Wednesday,\" Mr Garang\u00a0said.", "
School offering counselling
", "Madison Park School principal Michael Washington said the school wanted to express its \"deep sorrow\" for Ajok's family.", "\"We have been in contact today to see if there is any way we can support them during this difficult time,\" Mr Washington said.", "\"It's a really sad day for our whole school community and especially for Ajok's friends and the teachers and [school services officers]\u00a0who provided education and care for him every day.", "\"We have arranged for counselling to be available to help students and staff process the news.\"", "Police said there were no suspicious circumstances and they were\u00a0preparing a report for the coroner.", "", "
Paramedics worked on Ajok,\u00a0but he died at the scene.(ABC News)
", "In a statement, Surf Life Saving SA CEO Damien Marangon said he was deeply saddened by the boy's death.", "\"One drowning death in South Australia is one too many.", "\"We have to collectively do more to make swimming and water safety accessible and affordable for all South Australians.\""]
